subject: Baseball
Officiating (Sports)
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Wendelstedt was an umpire in five World Series during a 33-year major league career and taught hundreds of aspiring professional umpires at his Florida school.
snippet: Mr. Wendelstedt was an umpire in five World Series during a 33-year major league career and taught hundreds of aspiring professional umpires at his Florida school.
